name: SGB Animation - Fire Lv2
description:
A custom spell/skill Fire animation made for Smile Game Builder (SGB). These were originally to be used in The Leet Adventure but since the proejct is now shelved I have decided to release these now instead of when TLA was finally released officially as a full game.

NOTE: I dont see why these would'nt work for Bakin or any other engine for that matter. I haven't tried this myself so keep in mind I don't offer refunds for these assets if you are buying them for use in other engines that's NOT SGB.

USAGE NOTE:
-These animation sheets can NOT be claimed as your own and sold else where if altered in any way, shape, or form.
-I will allow you to recolor them if you wish.
-I DO NOT offer refunds once these assets are bought due to the type of asset it is.
-You can NOT share or resell these animations.
-I WILL allow them to be used in other Engines if it's possible, if they are bought for a different engine I can not be held responsible if they do not work as they are really intended for use with SGB.
-I will allow them to be reshaped/reformed for different engine use though if bought for other engines.
